thread.title: 5 Best Wisconsin Dells Water Parks

author: admin
title: 5 Best Wisconsin Dells Water Parks
text:
Home > Travel Information > 5 Best Wisconsin Dells Water Parks 5 Best Wisconsin Dells Water Parks By admin on July 8, 2015 Pin It 
Wisconsin is called the Dairyland of America and at the same time it is also popular as The Water Park Capital of the World. Wisconsin Dells is a place that possesses the largest number of water parks in the world. 
Wisconsin Dells Water Parks are very famous in USA. There are more than twenty outdoor and indoor water parks in Wisconsin Dells holding a combined total of more than 16 million gallons of water. Best Wisconsin Dells Water Parks 
Some of the best Wisconsin Dells water parks where you can enjoy have been discussed below: Noah’s Ark 
Noah’s Ark in Wisconsin Dells is the largest water park in the world. This waterpark is spread over an area of 70 acres holding over five million gallons of water. 
The park boasts of three miles of water slides in different varieties. Noah’s Ark is considered the gold standard amongst all outdoor water parks. 
For further details: Noah’s Ark Mt. Olympus Water and Theme Park 
Mt. Olympus Water and Theme Park is one of the best Wisconsin Dells water parks featuring thirty-seven slippery and steep water rides. 
Apart from this, visitors at this water park can also enjoy the experience of eight curve-hugging go-kart tracks, six hair-raising roller coasters and a number of other fun-filled and enjoyable attractions. 
For further details: Mt. Olympus Water and Theme Park Kalahari Waterparks, Resorts & Conventions 
The Kalahari Water Park Resort is located at 125,000 square feet and it is basically an African-themed water park resort. This is the largest indoor water park in America. The best feature of this water park is its surf machine which uses 50,000 gallons of water per minute. 
For further details: Kalahari Waterparks, Resorts & Conventions Wilderness Hotel And Golf Resort 
This resort in Wisconsin Dells offers a great combination of the world’s largest outdoor and indoor water park. The water park is very large and is loaded with some of the most thrilling and enjoyable water activities. 
For more details: Wilderness Hotel And Golf Resort Polynesian Water Park Resort 
This water park in Wisconsin Dells offers the combined service of both an outdoor and indoor water park which gives its visitors water-fueled fun. The water park is spread over 4 acres and is highlighted with lazy rivers, slippery slides and kiddie pools.
